body: I agree, but it would make the code 2x longer, because I couldn't use `return` (and would have to add `break` or some code to unwrap symbolic vars into values) 😉 I like it more this way, but don't mind inlining it if you'd prefer that way
body_html: I agree, but it would make the code 2x longer, because I couldn't use return (and would have to add break or some code to unwrap symbolic vars into values) 😉 I like it more this way, but don't mind inlining it if you'd prefer that way
